attributes.action: scrap emission ban targets  on vehicles
attributes.additional_details: The majority of people do not want electric vehicles, there manufacture causes more environmental harm, and they are to expensive and this policy does nothing to help us or the environment
attributes.background: We the majority wish the government to scrap all emission targets for vehicles including the 2030 target imposed on us

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704957
